name: One Night At The Happy Hotel
name_original: One Night At The Happy Hotel
description:
Warning: This game has depictions of murder and sexual references.

This is a Hazbin Hotel fan game. Despite the title, it is not inspired by Five Nights At Freddy's. Instead, it was inspired by One Night At Flumpty's 2. Like this inspiration, this game is only controlled by mouse.

In this game, you play as the newest employee of the Happy Hotel. However, things don't go exactly as you might expect. Now, you have to survive until 6 AM.
